summary: The module supplies a comprehensive set of utilities for starting and managing ANSYS Mechanical APDL (MAPDL) sessions. It can launch MAPDL locally, on HPC clusters, or connect to remote MAPDL instances via gRPC, handling commandâ€‘line arguments, licensing, port allocation, environment configuration, and process lifecycle monitoring.
business_intent: Allow developers and engineers to programmatically control MAPDL execution across diverse computing environments, facilitating automated simulation workflows, integration with Python applications, and scalable use of ANSYS resources.
